content:
### Scene
Mirror selfie in an otaku-style computer corner, blue color tone.

### Subject
* Gender expression: female
* Age: around 25
* Ethnicity: East Asian
* Body type: slim, with a defined waist; natural body proportions
* Skin tone: light neutral tone
* Hairstyle:
    * Length: waist-length hair
    * Style: straight with slightly curled ends
    * Color: medium brown
* Pose:
    * Stance: standing in a slight contrapposto pose
    * Right hand: holding a smartphone in front of her face (identity hidden)
    * Left arm: naturally hanging down alongside the torso
    * Torso: body leaning slightly back; waist and abdomen exposed
* Clothing:
    * Top: light blue cropped knit cardigan, top two buttons fastened; a blue French-style bra faintly visible
    * Bottom: denim ultra-short shorts, with a blue satin ribbon bow on each side of the hips
    * Socks: blue and white horizontal striped over-the-knee socks
    * Accessory: a blue cute mascot phone case

### Environment
* Description: bedroom computer corner seen through a wall-mounted mirror
* Furnishings:
    * White desk
    * Single monitor showing a soft blue wallpaper (no readable text)
    * Mechanical keyboard with white keycaps on a blue desk mat
    * Mouse on a small blue mouse pad
    * PC tower on the right side with blue case lighting
    * Three anime figures on or near the PC tower
    * A poster of a pagoda on the wall
    * Cat-shaped desk lamp with blue accents
    * A transparent glass of water
    * A tall green leafy plant by the window (on the left side of the frame)
* Color replacement: replace all originally pink elements (clothes and room decor) with blue tones (baby blue to sky blue/periwinkle blue).

### Lighting
* Light source: daylight coming from a large window on the left side of the camera, through sheer curtains
* Light quality: soft, diffused light
* White balance (K): 5200

### Camera
* Mode: smartphone rear camera shooting via the mirror (no portrait/bokeh mode)
* Equivalent focal length (mm): 26
* Distances (m):
    * Subject to mirror: 0.6
    * Camera to mirror: 0.5
* Exposure:
    * Aperture (f): 1.8
    * ISO: 100
    * Shutter speed (s): 0.01
    * Exposure compensation (EV): -0.3
* Focus: focus on the torso and shorts in the mirror image
* Depth of field: natural smartphone deep depth of field; background clearly visible with no artificial blur
* Composition:
    * Aspect ratio: 1:1
    * Crop: from the top of the head to mid-thigh; include the desk, monitor, PC tower, and plant in the frame
    * Angle: slightly high angle from the mirror’s point of view
    * Composition note: keep the subject centered; to avoid wide-angle edge distortion, have her stand a bit further away and crop to a square later.

### Negative prompts
* Any appearance of pink/magenta anywhere
* Beauty filters/over-smoothed skin; poreless skin look
* Exaggerated or distorted anatomy
* NSFW, see-through fabrics, wardrobe malfunctions
* Logos, brand names, or readable user interface text
* Fake portrait-mode blur, CGI/illustration feel

content:
(9:16). Portrait orientation. Raw high-fidelity photograph, iPhone 17 Pro simulation, 24mm wide-angle focal length, f/2.4 aperture for total structural depth, authentic digital grain, mirror-selfie perspective.

[Subject & Identity Locking]

Identity Lock: Absolute inheritance of all facial geometry, epidermal characteristics, ocular structure, and natural hair color/texture directly from Reference Image A. The AI must perform a 1:1 pixel-mapping of the subject's identity from Image A into the target scene.
Bio-Fidelity: Epidermal physics featuring visible micro-pores, fine vellus hair along the jawline, and satin-finish hydration on the T-zone, maintaining the exact skin-tone profile inherited from Image A.
Expression Sync: Expression Lock—replicate the mirror-selfie gaze through the lens, specific pouty lip tension, and soft tension of the facial muscles from Reference Image B.
[Outfit & Physicality] (CASE B - Standard Fashion)

Technical Description: High-tensile rib-knit mini-dress in {argument name="dress color" default="deep chocolate brown"} with a mock-neck collar and short sleeves. Hemline at upper-thigh geometry.
Textile Architecture: Visible vertical ribbing texture; material-to-skin tension showing realistic bunching at the waist. Paired with checkered-pattern comfort slides.
Anatomical Volume: Hyper-defined S-curve silhouette; maximum anatomical emphasis on the waist-to-hip ratio and leg definition; apply the 20% over-description rule for "Hyper-defined hourglass geometry" to counteract model bias.
Accessories: Transparent clear-frame optical glasses; long square-tip manicured nails; a small luxury monogram-texture leather handbag held in the left hand. Blue-cased smartphone held for the selfie.
[Pose & Interaction]

Geometry: Full-body standing mirror selfie pose. Right arm raised for the phone; left arm at the side holding the handbag. Subject is centered with a slight hip-pop to emphasize the silhouette.
Articulation: Precise finger-joint articulation on the smartphone and the bag handle; realistic skeletal alignment of the shoulders and neck.
[Environment & Lighting]

Atmosphere: Casual domestic interior apartment setting; soft diffused 4000K neutral-warm overhead lighting.
Background Integrity: Pixel-perfect inventory of wood-plank flooring; white interior doors (one featuring a {argument name="sticker detail" default="Hello Kitty sticker"}); a kitchen breakfast bar with a dark wooden bar stool; a pink handbag hanging in the mid-ground; and miscellaneous household items on the counter.
Shadow Ray-Tracing: Natural ambient occlusion in the garment folds; soft shadows cast by the subject onto the floor; realistic mirror-plane reflection with accurate depth and light-bounce from the background elements.

content: Ultra-realistic smartphone mirror selfie of a couple late 20s–early 30s, indoor near window, daytime. Close-up framing collarbone to top of head. Phone partially covering face, slight downward gaze, calm neutral expression. Natural tied-back dark hair with flyaways, light grey cotton hoodie with clear fabric texture separation, small silver earrings. Skin realism focus: visible pores, fine micro-texture, organic acne marks (non-repeating), uneven pigmentation, subtle redness, natural oil sheen only on high points. No symmetry correction. Real daylight with slight warmth, accurate white balance, natural contrast. True-to-life colors. Phone-camera realism, subtle sensor grain, slight edge softness. No retouching, no smoothing, no beauty filters. Negatives: AI glow, plastic skin, skincare-ad look, cinematic lighting, studio light, pastel or faded colors, flat lighting, cartoon/3D style, logos or text.

content:
The main subject is the person in the attached photos (hereinafter referred to as THE_SUBJECT). Carefully and accurately replicate THE_SUBJECT’s facial features, hairstyle, skin tone, proportions, and overall appearance exactly as shown in the photo. 

Create a photorealistic mirror-selfie of THE_SUBJECT sitting on the edge of a bathroom counter, slightly turned to the side while looking over her shoulder toward the mirror. She is holding her phone up with one hand to capture the photo.

The setting is a {argument name="bathroom style" default="modern, minimal bathroom"} with light neutral walls, a glass shower, folded towels, a marble countertop, and soft natural lighting. The photo should look exactly like a realistic phone selfie with accurate reflections, sharp detail, and natural skin texture. Create the image with perfect composition, lighting and photographic detail.

content: Vertical frame, realistic low-light phone selfie, in a dark night bedroom, face identical to the reference image. Pale face with bluish-purple screen light; dark background with beige blackout curtains on the left. Sleepy and cozy late-night lo-fi atmosphere, close-up, slightly low angle. Subject lying on their stomach, leaning on a patterned gray pillow, messy black hair and thin bangs. Soft, dreamy, vacant gaze, mouth slightly open, hand near the face with fingers touching the lips. Light black sleeveless rash top, thin silver necklace, left shoulder exposed. Soft focus, visible grain, high contrast between the bright face and dark background. content:
(9;16). Raw high-fidelity photograph, iPhone 17 Pro simulation, 24mm wide focal length, f/2.4 aperture for deep focus with natural fall-off, authentic digital grain, high-angle POV selfie perspective.

Identity Lock: Absolute inheritance of facial geometry coordinates from Image A. Almond-shaped eyes with dense volumetric lash definition, specific lip symmetry with soft satin hydration, and the distinct pigmented mole located at the right nasolabial coordinate. Hair is {argument name="hair color" default="raven-black"}, straight, shoulder-length with a sharp center part and natural volume framing the face.
Bio-Fidelity: Epidermal physics featuring visible micro-pores on the nose, fine vellus hair along the jawline, and realistic skin texture across the shoulders and décolletage.
Expression Sync: Expression Lock—replicate the intense upward-tilted gaze, slight chin-down posture, and relaxed neutral pout from Image B.

Outfit & Physicality:

Technical Description: Structured strapless technical corset top in deep {argument name="top color" default="espresso brown"} with centered vertical ruching and a sweetheart neckline.
Textile Architecture: High-tensile fabric-to-skin compression physics; visible elasticized horizontal banding and micro-pleats in the ruched center section.
Anatomical Volume: Hyper-defined silhouette with maximum anatomical emphasis on the décolletage, clavicle definition, and bust geometry; apply the 20% over-description for natural anatomical ratio definition.
Pose & Interaction:

Geometry: High-angle selfie geometry; torso angled 15 degrees with the right shoulder pulled slightly back to emphasize the neckline.
Articulation: Realistic skeletal structure of the collarbones (clavicles) and neck tendons under the skin; natural skin-fold physics at the armpit-to-garment junction.
Environment & Lighting:

Atmosphere: Domestic indoor apartment setting; soft-diffused overhead ambient lighting with a slight 4500K neutral-warm bloom from a ceiling source.
Background Integrity: Pixel-perfect inventory of a high-pile cream-colored shag rug, a white paneled interior door on the left, a black ergonomic desk chair in the background, and a bed with a grey and white patterned duvet.
Shadow Ray-Tracing: Soft ambient occlusion shadows in the garment folds and under the jawline; realistic depth-mapping of the subject against the complex background textures.
title: High-fidelity selfie with identity and expression lock
description: A highly technical prompt simulating a raw, high-fidelity iPhone 17 Pro selfie. It uses 'Identity Lock' and 'Expression Sync' to ensure absolute replication of facial geometry, specific anatomical features (like a mole), and expression from reference images, while detailing epidermal physics and textile architecture for hyper-realistic results.

content:
(9:16). Raw high-fidelity photograph, iPhone 17 Pro simulation, 35mm portrait focal length, f/1.8 aperture for shallow depth of field, authentic digital grain and high-contrast front-facing flash photography aesthetics.

Identity Lock: Absolute inheritance of facial geometry coordinates from Image A. Almond-shaped eyes with extreme volumetric lash density, specific lip symmetry with high-gloss hydration, and the distinct pigmented mole located at the right nasolabial coordinate. Hair is raven-black, straight, shoulder-length with a sharp center part and natural movement.
Bio-Fidelity: Epidermal physics featuring visible micro-pores, fine vellus hair along the jawline, and high-intensity specular highlights on the forehead and cheeks from the flash source.
Expression Sync: Expression Lock—replicate the direct-to-lens gaze, 15-degree head tilt, and relaxed neutral pout with emphasized philtrum geometry from Image B.

Outfit & Physicality:

Technical Description: Strapless technical compression-fit tube top in matte obsidian black, featuring a scalloped floral lace-trim overlay at the upper hem.
Textile Architecture: High-tensile fabric-to-skin tension; visible lace weave patterns and elasticized structural seaming.
Anatomical Volume: Hyper-defined silhouette with maximum anatomical emphasis on the décolletage and bust geometry; apply the 20% over-description for natural anatomical ratio definition.
Accessories: 1mm silver micro-link chain with a centered teardrop-shaped crystal pendant.
Pose & Interaction:

Geometry: Medium-close portrait perspective; torso angled slightly away while the head turns toward the lens; prominent collarbone (clavicle) and shoulder-joint definition.
Articulation: Natural shoulder elevation to frame the face; realistic skin-texture transitions at the underarm and neck.
Environment & Lighting:

Atmosphere: Dimly lit domestic bedroom environment; dominated by a powerful, hard-light front-facing flash creating sharp contrast.
Background Integrity: Pixel-perfect inventory of a white-on-white textured duvet with organic fabric folds, a dark-stained wood-grain headboard, and neutral-toned wall surfaces.
Shadow Ray-Tracing: Hard-edged drop shadow cast directly behind the subject onto the background; deep ambient occlusion in the folds of the black garment.

content:
Use the attached face photo as is to create a vertical 3-frame low-res webcam collage.

Absolute rules regarding the face:

Do not alter the face at all

Maintain the exact proportions of features, face shape, eye size, nose, mouth, and jawline

Do not make the person look younger or overly cute

Do not change the gender of the person in the input photo

Do not generate new people (opposite/same sex)

Hairstyle:

Maintain the original hairstyle

Do not change the length, parting, or curl

Only render it in a naturally slightly messy, rough state

Shooting Tone & Color (Reference Reflection):

Express the colors identically to the attached reference photo

Background:

Japanese wooden Ryokan.

Minimize background details

Maintain a dark and blurry state

Clothing Rules (Based on Input Photo):

If the input photo is female → Black {argument name="female attire" default="Yukata"} with red floral patterns in all frames

If the input photo is male → Black silk dress shirt with a {argument name="male attire" default="red tie"} in all frames

1st Frame:

Sad expression like a protagonist in a sad movie

Finger near the mouth

2nd Frame:

Head slightly turned to the side

Show the beautiful profile

Casual selfie feel, no excessive posing

3rd Frame:

Warm and beautiful smile

Hands clasped together, resting the chin on them

Emotion is calm and dreamy atmosphere

Important Additional Instructions:

Use only the one person in the input photo

Do not change gender, face, or atmosphere

Style changes should only be applied to lighting, color, noise, and effects

Use the same face consistently across all frames

Absolute rules regarding effects:

Apply the same cinesteel 800T film style and cinematic light effects in all frames.

Absolute rules regarding effects:

Apply the same red lighting effect on one side and a tasteful motion blur effect from left to right in all frames.
title: 3-Frame Film Collage Prompt (Photographer Version)
description: A multi-frame prompt designed for Nano Banana Pro/Gemini to create a 3-frame, low-resolution webcam collage with a cinematic film aesthetic (Cinesteel 800T). It strictly requires using an uploaded face photo without changing the person's features, gender, or age. It specifies background (Japanese Ryokan), clothing (Yukata or Silk Shirt based on gender), and distinct emotional poses for each frame, including specific lighting effects (red light, motion blur).

content:
[Header] (9:16)
Raw high-fidelity photograph, iPhone 17 Pro sensor simulation, low-light indoor ambient photography, zero bokeh, SHARP focus from the foreground manicured nails to the background hair texture, f/2.8 aperture for high-contrast clarity, authentic digital grain.
[Subject & Identity Locking]

Identity: Absolute preservation of Image A’s specific facial geometry, emphasizing the almond eye shape, high lip volume with defined brunette-toned lip liner, and structured chin.
Bio-Fidelity: Detailed skin physics including micro-pores, satin-finish hydration, and visible fine vellus hair. A technical beauty mark (mole) is positioned just above the right corner of the mouth (philtrum area).
Lash Architecture: High-density technical volume lashes with individual strand separation and a defined feline-wing lift.
Expression: High-impact visual allure; a neutral but magnetic gaze directed toward the camera lens.
[Outfit & Physicality]

Technical Description: High-impact minimalist performance-wear.
Textile Geometry: Technical strapless compression-fit bodice (tube top) in a dusty rose/mauve hue. The upper hemline features a subtle smocked or ribbed elastic-gather architecture.
Accessories: Silver-tone technical cross-shaped drop earrings featuring white pearl studs at the lobe; a minimalist ultra-thin silver-link chain necklace.
Manicure: Technical application of long, almond-shaped performance nails in a neutral nude-satin finish.
Surface Physics: High-tensile material-to-skin surface compression highlighting anatomical bust volume symmetry and the elegant S-curve of the neck.
[Pose & Composition]

Geometry: Medium close-up portrait framing. The subject is angled slightly toward the camera.
Interaction: Technical hand-to-face contact; the left hand is positioned against the cheek with the index finger resting near the corner of the mouth, showing realistic finger-joint articulation and skin texture.
Anatomy: Realistic shoulder-joint displacement and upper-body symmetry, reflecting the athletic-to-lean transition characteristic of Image A.
[Environment & Lighting]

Atmosphere: Moody, intimate domestic interior.
Lighting: Warm 2700K amber ambient lighting from a single directional source. This creates a high-saturation orange-to-gold glow on the subject’s skin and hair while casting deep, clean shadows that define the anatomical contours of the face and torso.
Background Integrity: A minimalist, neutral-toned background with subtle architectural shadows. All background elements must remain in sharp focus with zero artificial blurring.
[Failure Prevention Rule]

Command: Use "Technical strapless compression-fit bodice" and "Silver cross earrings with pearl studs" to ensure the AI maintains the exact material and accessory detail. Constraint: Explicitly command "Zero artificial bokeh" and "Sharp focus on manicured nails" to ensure the photo maintains an authentic smartphone aesthetic. Specify "Anatom

content:
Ultra-detailed silly playful close-up selfie of two young girls taken indoors, spontaneous and candid, shot at arm’s length with a wide-angle smartphone lens creating slight natural perspective distortion.
On the left: a brunette girl leaning very close into the frame, head slightly tilted, tongue out playfully, mischievous sparkling eyes, soft natural brows, high-shine glossy lips, subtle lip texture visible, healthy glowing skin with realistic pores, faint natural freckles, smooth cheeks catching warm highlights. She wears a delicate thin gold necklace resting on her collarbone and a stylish checkered top with visible fabric texture and stitching.
On the right: a short-haired girl with a fun cropped haircut, making an exaggerated goofy distorted face—puffed cheeks, slightly crossed eyes, playful asymmetry, expressive facial muscles frozen mid-joke. Lips look hydrated and glossy, skin luminous and smooth, realistic light reflections on cheeks and forehead.
Both faces are very close to the camera, filling most of the frame, creating an intimate selfie feel. Playful, goofy, carefree mood, strong sense of friendship and shared laughter. Warm indoor lighting with soft golden tones, cozy ambience, gentle shadows shaping the face, natural color balance. Background softly blurred and unobtrusive, hint of an indoor room without distraction.
Hyper-realistic rendering, photorealistic quality, ultra-sharp focus on eyes and lips, realistic skin texture, fine facial hair barely visible, natural makeup, authentic imperfections, high resolution, cinematic warmth, social-media selfie aesthetic, candid moment frozen in time.

content:
{
  "task": "Generate a hyper-real studio photograph that matches the composition of the reference image: a centered adult person in a tuxedo, surrounded by many hands entering the frame from all sides holding objects toward the person, with a curtain backdrop whose color matches the theme.",
  "variables": {
    "USER_PHOTO": "<<UPLOAD_OR_URL_TO_USER_FACE_OR_PORTRAIT>>",
    "SUBJECT_THEME": "{argument name="subject theme" default="finance"}",
    "HAND_PROPS": [
      "<<PROP_1 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_2 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_3 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_4 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_5 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_6 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_7 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>",
      "<<PROP_8 RELATED TO SUBJECT_THEME>>"
    ]
  },
  "prompt": "Create an ultra photorealistic studio photo (hyper-real, DSLR look) with the SAME composition and framing as the reference: a centered adult person standing front-facing, waist-up to mid-thigh visible, wearing a dark navy tuxedo jacket, crisp white shirt, and black bow tie, smiling confidently. The person has round eyeglasses and neat facial hair (mustache + short beard), but the FACE must be replaced with the user's likeness from USER_PHOTO while keeping natural skin texture, pores, and realistic facial proportions (no plastic skin, no cartooning). The lighting is clean professional studio lighting with soft shadows, high dynamic range, crisp detail.\n\nSurround the person with 8–10 different hands and forearms entering the frame from the edges (top, left, right, bottom), each holding an object and aiming it toward the center person (close to the face/upper torso). The hands belong to different people (varied sleeves/patterns/colors), but keep them realistic and anatomically correct.\n\nIMPORTANT: The ONLY changing elements across generations are: (1) the user's face from USER_PHOTO, and (2) the objects held in the hands. Everything else stays consistent: the tuxedo pose, camera angle, lens look, and overall composition.\n\nOBJECT RULE: Select HAND_PROPS so they are strongly related to SUBJECT_THEME. The objects must be clearly visible, realistic, and varied (mix of modern and vintage if it fits). Examples by theme:\n- music: studio headphones, microphone, vinyl record, cassette, guitar pick, small synth, metronome\n- gaming: controller, handheld console, gaming headset, mouse, keyboard, VR accessory\n- cooking: chef thermometer, whisk, spice grinder, mini pan, piping bag, recipe card\n- finance: calculator, credit card reader, stock ticker printout, smartphone with finance app, receipt roll\n- fitness: smartwatch, resistance band, shaker bottle, jump rope handle\n\nBACKGROUND: Use a curtain backdrop (like a stage/studio curtain) with a color"

content:
I. Composition
1 Layout: Overall 3:4 ratio, four-panel collage, 3:4 small images arranged in 2x2
2 Framing: Close-up to extreme close-up, subject occupies a large proportion of the screen
3 Angle: Eye-level close-up, slight left/right variation, uniform clean background

II. Main Subject
1 Reference Source: Use uploaded reference image as the strict identity source
2 Consistency Requirement: Zero deviation
3 Face: Delicate face shape, slightly large eyes, a small mole below the right eye, long and thin nose bridge
4 Skin Quality: Fair with light pink undertones, delicate skin, slight soft focus
5 Details: Prominent highlights on the nose bridge and mid-face, slight redness on cheeks and nose tip, scattered light freckles

III. Makeup Details
1 Base Makeup: Transparent and clean, light matte finish with slight sheen
2 Blush: Pink concentrated on the cheeks and sides of the nose bridge
3 Eye Makeup: Naturally enlarged, long lashes, clear eyes
4 Lip Makeup: Hydrated, plump lips, gradient from light pink to peach, soft cupid's bow

IV. Hairstyle and Accessories
1 Hairstyle: Black long straight hair, center part, full volume, naturally draped
2 Flyaways: Small amount of hair naturally floating around the forehead
3 Hair Accessories: One pink hair clip on each side, bright pink and light pink colors, metal clip visible

V. Hands and Accessories
1 Nails: Extra-long shape, translucent or light colors, with fine glitter and 3D decorations
2 Rings: Multiple pink cute-shaped rings, candy and floral aesthetics, exaggerated but soft and cute volume
3 Hand Gesture Style: Near the face and lips, highlighting nail and ring details

VI. Clothing and Material
1 Top: Fuzzy textured jacket or sleeves, white fluffy and soft
2 Inner Wear: Light pink camisole or top, off-shoulder or one-shoulder effect
3 Overall Style: Sweet and soft, with a touch of cool edge

VII. Four Panel Actions and Expressions
1 Top Left: Hands cupping face close to the camera, expression is cold and slightly wronged, looking directly at the camera
2 Top Right: Finger near the lips or lightly touching the lip edge, eyes calm and slightly teasing, closer extreme close-up
3 Bottom Left: Chin or arm resting on the edge of a table, eyes looking sideways, expression is dazed and vacant
4 Bottom Right: Hand clenched lightly against the chin, smiling but restrained, looking directly at the camera, more approachable demeanor

VIII. Lighting and Tone
1 Lighting: High-key soft light, very shallow shadows, uniform overall
2 Color Tone: Predominantly cool white background, pink accents highlighted, skin tone leans cool pink
3 Contrast: Low contrast, clean and transparent, not heavy

IX. Texture and Visual Effect
1 Clarity: Features and hair strands are clear, skin details preserved but with slight blurring/softening
2 Depth of Field: Background blur is very weak or almost textureless, subject is more prominent
3 Atmosphere: Sweet Korean girl group magazine photo style, sweet and cute, delicate and dreamy, slight glass-like sheen.

GLOBAL STYLE & QUALITY

Ultra-high resolution hyper-realistic photography, natural skin texture, real-world lighting physics, true-to-life proportions, cinematic shallow depth of field, premium lifestyle photo realism, no stylization, no CGI look, no illustration artifacts

FACE

Soft youthful face with natural symmetry, smooth realistic skin pores, subtle blush on cheeks, gentle smile
One eye playfully winking, the other eye open and expressive
Natural makeup, light peach lips, soft eyeliner, no exaggerated beauty edits
BODY
Slim feminine body with soft natural curves, realistic waist-to-hip ratio
Relaxed but confident posture, shoulders slightly back
Body language is flirty yet casual, not posed like a model, feels spontaneous

SKIN

Fair skin tone with very subtle sun warmth, smooth transitions
No artificial shine, no plastic skin
Natural light reflecting softly on shoulders and arms
HAIR
Long brown hair tied in a high ponytail, loose natural waves
A few soft strands framing the face
Hair texture is realistic, individual strands visible under sunlight

CAMERA & ANGLE

Medium full-body shot
Camera positioned slightly below chest level, angled to the side
Subject turned sideways, body angled while face looks toward camera
Natural lens compression, realistic focal length (50–85mm look)
SETTING
Outdoor rooftop or terrace environment
{argument name="lighting time" default="Golden hour sunset"} lighting
Background softly blurred with natural bokeh
 No identifiable people in background, only vague architectural shapes

SCENE SETUP

Casual candid moment
Subject holding a smartphone in one hand
Other hand raised near face making a peace sign (V sign)
Feels like a spontaneous lifestyle photo, not staged
BIKINI / OUTFIT
Top: Strapless {argument name="bikini color" default="grey"} tube bikini-style top, tight fit, exposing shoulders and collarbones
Bottom: High-waisted denim short shorts with lace-up front detail, distressed edges
Outfit is minimal, youthful, summer casual
No logos, no distracting patterns

PROPS (FLATLAY FEEL)

Smartphone held naturally in hand
No additional accessories
Focus stays on body language and outfit
EXPRESSION & MOOD
Playful, confident, teasing expression
Winking adds flirt energy
Mood is light, warm, approachable, seductive without being explicit
ATMOSPHERE

Warm sunset tones
Soft highlights on skin
Balanced exposure — no overblown whites, no crushed shadows
Natural ambient light only

FINAL RESULT GOAL
A hyper-realistic seductive lifestyle photograph that looks like it was taken by a professional photographer during golden hour,
natural, believable, premium social media aesthetic,
 bold but classy, flirty without exaggeration,
indistinguishable from a real photo.

content:
Use the provided reference image as the sole identity and facial structure reference. Create a 3 by 3 grid of face focused portraits of the same woman, maintaining identical facial features, proportions, expression baseline, and realism across all frames.

Each panel should show a distinct head angle and facial perspective, while preserving lighting consistency, lens realism, and natural skin texture. No change in hairstyle, makeup style, or facial identity.

Grid breakdown

Top row
1.Front facing neutral angle, eyes looking directly into camera
2.Three quarter view facing right, slight head tilt, eyes forward
3.Full right side profile, clean silhouette of nose, lips, and jawline

Middle row
4. Three quarter view facing left, soft head tilt, confident gaze
5. Slight low angle looking down toward the camera, subtle power pose
6. Slight high angle looking upward, relaxed expression

Bottom row
7. Head turned right with eyes looking back toward camera
8. Head turned left with eyes looking back toward camera
9. Near rear three quarter angle showing cheekbone, jawline, and ear contour

Technical and visual requirements

Ultra realistic portrait photography
85mm lens look, shallow depth of field
Sharp facial detail, visible skin texture, natural pores
Soft daylight illumination with gentle shadow falloff
Neutral background with no distractions
Consistent framing so all faces align cleanly within the grid
High resolution, editorial quality, fashion and beauty standard

Strict constraints

Do not alter facial structure
Do not stylize or cartoonize
Do not change expression drastically
No text, no watermark, no distortion
Same person in all nine frames

  "prompt": "Use the uploaded reference image as the absolute identity anchor. Preserve the subject’s facial features, facial proportions, bone structure, eyes, nose, lips, skin tone, hairline, hair texture, body shape, and overall likeness with maximum fidelity. Do not beautify, idealize, or alter the person in any way. A cinematic, vintage-style outdoor portrait of the same person. For each generation, vary the subject’s pose naturally (e.g., slight body angle changes, subtle lean, head tilt, arm positioning) while keeping the same prop: a bright {argument name="prop color" default="red"} lollipop held near the lips or face. Maintain a calm, confident expression. The subject wears a white strapless bandeau top and high-waisted light-blue distressed denim shorts. Lighting is soft, warm, and natural during golden hour. The image has a strong analog film aesthetic with heavy grain, dust, scratches, subtle fading, and a warm brown-orange color cast, resembling an old 35mm photograph. content:
(Vertical 9:16 smartphone aspect ratio). A raw, high-contrast [Gym Interior Mirror Capture] taken with an iPhone 17 Pro using the 0.5x ultra-wide-angle lens. NO ARTIFICIAL BOKEH. Every focal plane remains SHARP and in focus, from the subject's skin to the distant gym equipment.
Subject & Identity Locking:
•Identity: Strictly preserve the exact heart-shaped facial structure and unique features of the woman in Image 1 (Selfie).
•Bio-Fidelity: Render high-fidelity "TrueLens" biological physics: visible micro-pores, a natural "satin-finish" night hydration glow, and fine vellus hair catching the overhead light ONLY along the jawline.
•Silhouette Calibration (MAXIMUM UFF-FACTOR): Prioritize a dominant structural upper-torso volume and substantial, thick-toned anatomical depth in the lower extremities. Focus on an aggressive architectural tapering at the midsection to maximize the S-curve geometry.
Outfit & Textural Interaction:
•Clothing: A high-density, matte-black technical textile tee and matching high-tension minimalist athletic shorts.
•Tension: The technical fabric exhibits extreme mechanical tension and a vacuum-tight fit, creating realistic textural expansion and "tension lines" where the material contours to her fit silhouette.
•Matter Physics: White high-density cotton crew socks showing realistic textural contact and weight distribution against the tiled floor.
Pose & Composition:
•Pose: A 3/4 side-profile mirror selfie. She is standing with an axial rotation of the torso toward the mirror, arching her spine and popping her hip to highlight the symmetrical 3D volume of her physique.
•Action: Her RIGHT HAND holds a smartphone with a decorative casing, capturing the full-body "fit-check" reflection.
•UI Overlay: A white digital clock timestamp in the top-left corner reads "8:33 PM" in a simple sans-serif font.
Environment & Social Realism:
•Lighting: Direct, harsh overhead industrial lighting creating high-contrast specular highlights and deep, defining shadows that amplify her 3D form.
•Background (SHARP): A detailed commercial gym interior. A vibrant neon-green structural pillar, a white tiled floor with visible grout lines, and dark athletic benches are all perfectly IN FOCUS. No artificial blur.
Quality: Raw unedited social-media dump aesthetic, high dynamic range, visible digital grain in the deep shadows (ISO 1600 style), 8k resolution. Everything is sharp, detailed, and physically real.
title: Hyper-Realistic Gym Mirror Selfie Prompt (iPhone 17 Pro Simulation)
description: A highly technical prompt for Gemini Nano Banana Pro designed to simulate a raw, high-contrast gym mirror selfie taken with an ultra-wide-angle iPhone 17 Pro lens. It mandates extreme bio-fidelity, sharp focus across all planes (no bokeh), aggressive anatomical tapering, and realistic textural details on clothing and skin, aiming for an unedited social media dump aesthetic.

Ultra-realistic photorealistic image, adult woman (21+), curvy yet toned feminine body, light to medium warm beige skin tone with soft peach undertones, natural skin texture with visible pores, slightly wet skin with subtle reflective sheen.
Soft oval face shape, gently rounded cheeks with natural blush, smooth feminine jawline, rounded chin. Almond-shaped medium brown eyes with calm, confident expression, slightly hooded eyelids, natural lashes. Medium-thickness softly arched dark brown eyebrows. Medium straight nose with soft rounded tip. Full natural lips, pink with warm undertone, lightly glossy, relaxed closed lips with faint confident smile.
Dark brown hair, slicked back wet look, center-parted, smooth strands pulled back behind shoulders.
Wearing a deep royal blue textured bikini, triangle bikini top with thin neck-tie straps, supportive natural fit, matching low-rise bikini bottoms, fabric slightly shimmering when wet.
Scene set in a private outdoor stone shower courtyard. Large gray stone slab walls with visible cracks, weathering, damp stains. Wet stone tile floor with reflections. A metal wall-mounted shower spout releasing a thin stream of water, droplets frozen mid-air. Potted green plant in a brown clay pot near a simple wooden spa bench.
2x2 grid collage layout, four different poses of the same woman:
• kneeling pose with one leg forward, one arm raised behind head
• close-up selfie angle focusing on face and upper torso
• kneeling upright pose with direct eye contact
• seated pose with legs extended diagonally, one arm supporting body
Natural daylight from open sky, soft diffused lighting, gentle shadows, subtle highlights on wet skin and stone surfaces. Neutral color grading with slight warmth, medium contrast, natural saturation.
Shot on wide-angle smartphone camera, 24mm equivalent, sharp focus, slight wide-angle edge distortion, realistic handheld perspective.
Extremely high realism, face consistency across all frames, accurate anatomy, no blur, no distortion, no AI artifacts.
Aspect ratio 9:16

content: A young woman with a slender figure and graceful curves, with wavy dark long hair, is taking a mirror selfie in front of a mirror in a modern gym. She is wearing a set of eye-catching rose pink sportswear, including a tight sports bra and tight sports shorts, showcasing an excellent waist-to-hip ratio and fair skin tone. In terms of composition, she is standing sideways within the frame of a black Smith machine, holding her phone up with her right hand, stretching her left hand up to grasp the top beam of the equipment, and lightly lifting her left leg, resting the line of her leg on the horizontal barbell. The environmental lighting is sufficient and uniform, presenting a cool industrial feel, with the surfaces of the metal equipment reflecting cold highlights, and the floor being a dark gray non-slip rubber mat with fine particles. In the background, clearly visible are arranged barbell plates, orange fitness equipment supports, and a white wall with black artistic lettering. The color scheme features a strong contrast between high-saturation rose pink and calm black and gray, supplemented by a few touches of orange. The overall image quality is delicate, with distinct light and shadow layers, presenting a modern, fashionable, and vibrant fitness atmosphere.
title: Photorealistic Gym Selfie Portrait with Specific Composition and Color Palette

The prompt specifies her appearance, clothing (high-saturation rose pink sportswear), pose, the surrounding gym equipment (Smith machine, barbell plates), lighting (cool industrial light), and a strong color contrast between the pink and dark gray/black elements. It also mentions the use of a reference image of the model for identity locking.

content: Prompt for selfie photos using Nano Banana Pro
title: Nano Banana Pro Prompt for Realistic Selfie Photos
description: A prompt specifically designed for Nano Banana Pro to generate realistic-looking selfie photos. This prompt has been fine-tuned to achieve a high degree of realism and texture.

content: Tatum is frantically racing the clock—she's already {argument name="minutes late" default="30 minutes"} late for the underground warehouse rave downtown. Her friends are blowing up her phone, but she’s struggling with the final touch: a reflective, high-tension vinyl corset. She snatches a quick, tense mirror selfie in the hallway to check if the zipper is going to hold, capturing the rush, the sweaty skin from the stress, and the sheer chaos of trying to achieve peak glamour under pressure. She's not smiling; she's intensely focused on the phone screen's preview.
title: Tense Mirror Selfie Before a Rave Prompt
description: A narrative-driven prompt focusing on a moment of high-tension glamour: a woman named Tatum taking a frantic mirror selfie in a hallway while struggling to zip up a reflective vinyl corset before being late for an underground rave. The prompt emphasizes sweaty skin, chaos, and intense focus rather than a posed smile.

•Appearance: Short dark auburn-red hair styled in a sleek, chin-length architectural bob.
•Bio-Fidelity: Render high-fidelity "TrueLens" biological physics: visible micro-pores, a natural "satin-finish" skin hydration glow, and fine vellus hair catching the light ONLY along the jawline. Her skin features a healthy, uniform tone.
•Silhouette Calibration (MAXIMUM UFF-FACTOR): Prioritize a dominant structural upper-torso volume and substantial, thick-toned anatomical depth in the lower extremities. Emphasize an aggressive architectural tapering at the midsection to maximize the S-curve geometry.
Outfit & Textural Interaction:
•Clothing: A high-density ribbed light-pink textile bodice featuring delicate ivory-colored architectural lace trim. Paired with high-tension minimalist elasticated lower apparel.
•Tension: The technical fabric exhibits extreme mechanical tension and a vacuum-tight fit, creating realistic textural expansion, skin-to-textile indentations, and "compression lines" where the material contours to her fit silhouette.
•Action: The subject is captured performing a manual upward adjustment of the bodice hem, creating realistic fabric-stress vectors and highlighting the fit anatomical depth of the midriff.
Pose & Composition:
•Pose: A straight-on frontal composition within a large circular reflective frame. She is standing with a bilateral hip-pop to accentuate the symmetrical volume and fit proportions of her physique.
•Action: Her RIGHT HAND holds a white smartphone with a clear protective casing, capturing the full-body "fit-check" reflection.
Environment & Social Realism:
•Lighting: Naturalistic indoor daylight streaming from a side-view window, creating high-contrast specular highlights and deep, defining shadows that amplify her 3D form.
•Background (SHARP): A detailed domestic interior showing uncurated realism. A bed with textured grey compressed linens, a digital musical synthesizer, and a dark suitcase are all perfectly IN FOCUS. Visible through the glass is a sharp, red-brick urban structure. No artificial blur.
Quality: Raw unedited social-media dump aesthetic, high dynamic range, visible digital grain in the deep shadows, 8k resolution. Everything is sharp, detailed, and physically real.

content:
[Theme] A young woman with dark brown/black hair styled in a bun, with a few wispy bangs falling on her forehead; looking directly at the camera, with a calm and slightly languid expression. Right hand supporting her cheek, left hand holding a phone in a selfie pose.

[Makeup and Skin Texture] Natural, clear makeup, clean eye makeup, distinct eyelashes, moist lips; extremely delicate skin, the overall complexion shows a blue-purple sheen under the cold light.

[Clothing] White thin-strap low-cut top (simple, fitted style).

[Accessories] Layered transparent pink beaded bracelet and a thin gold chain bracelet (with small flower/clover pendant) on the wrist; nails painted with light nude nail polish.

[Props] A bright yellow phone/phone case is very eye-catching (located in the lower left corner of the frame), enhancing the realism of a “casual social selfie.”

[Scene] Dim restaurant/bar atmosphere, with thick black curtains as the background; white round table with wine glasses and small objects, multiple warm yellow table lamps creating a cozy ambient light.

[Light and Color] The subject is illuminated by cold blue-purple fill light (such as screen light/LED fill light), while the background emits warm yellow tungsten light, forming a sharp cold/warm contrast; the background is slightly blurred to highlight the portrait.

[Photography Language] Vertical composition, close-up half-body shot (above the chest), slightly high-angle/eye-level perspective, with the texture of a phone portrait mode, medium-shallow depth of field, and the image texture is “clear yet soft.”

content: Overview: This photo captures a highly atmospheric indoor Mirror Selfie. It freezes a moment of a young Asian woman in a relaxed state, featuring a strong "Pure and Desire" style (Innocent yet alluring) and an authentic social media lifestyle vibe.  Subject Features: Female, with fair complexion (cool porcelain skin). Her long black hair is tied back (into a low ponytail or bun), with air bangs framing her forehead and face. The makeup is exquisite yet natural, emphasizing reddish lips and a clear, translucent foundation.  Expression & Mood: Her eyes are either dreamy or focused on the phone screen, with her head tilted slightly, conveying a sense of nonchalant elegance. Her mouth is closed, and her expression is calm with a hint of sultriness.  Pose: Seated. She sits on a black leather chair, leaning back. Her right hand rests lazily behind her head/neck area, while her left hand holds the phone (silver iPhone) to take the mirror selfie. This pose naturally showcases her neck and shoulder lines.  Outfit Details: The core visual point is the "slouchy / effortlessly disheveled" style. She wears a white deep V-neck long-sleeved top (the material looks soft, like modal or fine knit). The neckline slips off, revealing her collarbones, a large area of skin on her chest, and visible black thin bra straps, creating a classic "black and white contrast" and a hint of sexiness. She wears black trousers on the bottom.  Environment & Lighting: The background is very simple, featuring beige/grey wallpaper and wooden door frames or mirror frames on the sides. The lighting is soft and even, resembling indoor natural light or softbox lighting, giving the skin a delicate texture. There is a black hair tie on her wrist (adding a touch of realistic detail).  Vibe: Intimate, casual, the refined daily life of an urban woman, and a sense of relaxation.

content: Tatum is attempting the 'perfectly imperfect' post-reformer selfie, ten minutes after her Pilates class ended. She’s sweaty and annoyed because the direct, overhead studio lighting keeps washing out her contour, so she resorted to the harsh iPhone flash in the dark corner by the water cooler. She’s trying to capture the subtle muscle definition in her abs and back, but the tight angle makes her look intensely focused on the screen, not the viewer. She is balancing the phone precariously on the water bottle refill station to get the high-angle shot.

content: Scene: Nighttime inside a car (driver’s seat, on the left side of the frame). The instrument cluster and center console glow with crisp cool white/blue backlighting. Outside the window is a dim roadway with streetlight bokeh, adding a slight sense of motion and an urban night atmosphere.  Subject & emotion: A young adult woman sits on the left side of the image and turns her head to the right to look back at the camera. She makes direct eye contact with a playful, subtly flirty “caught candid” vibe. She holds her left hand horizontally across the lower half of her face, revealing only her eyes and brow area—an instantly memorable gesture.  Hair & texture: Long, straight hair with a slightly center part; light blonde with even lighter highlighted streaks. The strands look smooth and glossy, catching reflections from the flash.  Outfit: A black spaghetti-strap bra-style top paired with low-rise jeans, giving an authentic “night out / getting into the car after a party” social-media feel.  Detail boosters: Nude/pale pink manicure; a delicate chain bracelet on the wrist. Warm fair skin tone. The direct flash creates high contrast and soft shadows that sculpt the body and add dimension.  Photography language: Clear smartphone on-camera flash in a dark environment. Vertical close medium framing, shot from the passenger side/back-seat angle, capturing her upper body along with the steering wheel, door trim, and dashboard—very Instagram/social-media candid.

content:
Ultra-photorealistic smartphone selfie photo (front camera), portrait 4:5. A young adult woman seated at a kitchen table, centered framing from mid-torso to top of head. She has shoulder-length dark brown hair with soft layers, curtain bangs, and two small black hair clips on both sides. Expression is calm and slightly pouty, natural skin texture, minimal makeup. She raises her hand close to her face making a peace/V sign, with the fingers framing one eye. She wears a white ribbed camisole with delicate lace trim.
Lighting is strong direct morning sunlight coming from a large window on the left, creating hard shadows and bright highlights across her face, chest, and the table.
Environment: a bright modern kitchen with white walls and cabinets; a refrigerator in the background covered with small colorful magnets/souvenir magnets.
Foreground on the table: a white pump lotion bottle, a blue plastic water bottle, an amber pill/vitamin bottle, a pack of wet wipes, and some snack packaging including a red rectangular box, all slightly cluttered and casually placed.
Style: realistic color, natural contrast, sharp focus, high detail, authentic candid selfie look, HDR-like dynamic range, subtle film grain, no retouching, no beauty filter.
Negative Prompt (use this)
Blurry, low-res, over-smoothed skin, heavy makeup, glam retouching, unrealistic doll face, warped hands, extra fingers, missing fingers, deformed peace sign, crossed eyes, bad anatomy, distorted background, duplicated objects, text, watermark, logo, posterized lighting.
Suggested Settings
Aspect ratio: 4:5
Lens look: smartphone wide (24–28mm equivalent)
Quality: high / ultra detail
Style strength: low–medium (keep it natural)
also make watermark "doctorwasif" at bottom right corner

content:
(Vertical 9:16 smartphone aspect ratio). A raw, high-contrast [Mirror Capture] taken with an iPhone 17 Pro. NO ARTIFICIAL BOKEH. All planes of the image are SHARP and in focus from the subject's feet to the background window blinds.
Subject & Identity Locking:
•Identity: Strictly preserve the exact face and unique features of the woman in Image 1 (Selfie).
•Bio-Fidelity: Render high-fidelity "TrueLens" skin physics: visible micro-pores, natural "satin-finish" night hydration glow, and fine peach fuzz catching the light ONLY along the jawline.
•Expression: Looking into the mirror reflection with a magnetic, "cheeky" gaze, performing a subtle labial compression (lip bite). Her hair falls naturally over her shoulder.
•Silhouette Calibration (MAXIMUM UFF-FACTOR): Replicate the high-impact prone proportions. Focus on the structural lower-torso volume and substantial, thick-toned anatomical depth. Emphasize the aggressive architectural tapering at the midsection and the deep S-curve of the lower back.
Outfit & Material Realism:
•Clothing: A high-tension light-{argument name="top color" default="yellow"} cropped jersey-knit top and ultra-fitted {argument name="shorts color" default="white"} high-elasticity micro-shorts with a wide waistband.
•Tension: The technical fabric shows extreme mechanical tension and a vacuum-tight fit, creating realistic physical interaction and "tension lines" where the material contours to her fit silhouette.
•Matter Physics: Realistic skin-to-surface compression (squish) is visible where her torso and thighs interact with the high-texture grey bedding. Her raised feet show detailed anatomical sole textures.
Pose & Composition:
•Pose: A prone horizontal alignment (lying on her stomach) with an axial rotation of the torso toward the mirror. Her lower limbs are elevated at the knees.
•Action: Her RIGHT HAND holds a pink smartphone at a natural angle, capturing the full-body "fit-check" reflection.
Environment & Social Realism:
•Lighting: Naturalistic, low-light indoor setting. The scene is side-lit, creating high-contrast specular highlights on her skin and the {argument name="top color" default="yellow"} fabric, casting sharp, pitch-black shadows that define her 3D volume.
•Background (SHARP): A detailed domestic bedroom. A window with horizontal blinds, dark heavy curtains, and a grey textured faux-fur duvet are all perfectly IN FOCUS. No artificial depth-of-field.
Quality: Raw unedited social-media dump aesthetic, high dynamic range, visible digital grain in the deep shadows (ISO 1600 style), 8k resolution. Single frame.

content:
A mirror selfie taken inside a commercial gym, photographed with a smartphone front camera. The subject is an attractive, athletic woman with a curvy, feminine build, strong thighs and hips, toned legs, and a confident stance. She is wearing a black tank top with a deep neckline and {argument name="shorts color" default="olive-green"} high-waisted workout shorts, white socks, and white trainers.

She stands inside a squat rack, one knee slightly bent, hips angled forward, leaning casually against the barbell. The gym environment is clearly visible: metal racks, weight machines, rubber flooring, high industrial ceiling with exposed beams, warm overhead lights, and other gym-goers blurred in the background.

Her face is fully visible and resembles {argument name="subject likeness" default="Sydney Sweeney"} — soft facial features, expressive eyes, blonde hair styled naturally, minimal makeup, realistic skin texture — captured casually as if mid-workout. Expression is relaxed and confident, not posed.

The photo has a raw smartphone aesthetic:

noticeable film grain and digital noise

low resolution

mild blur and compression artifacts

imperfect focus

uneven indoor lighting

slightly warm color cast

The image feels candid and unpolished, like a real gym mirror selfie posted online.
Photorealistic, casual realism, modern lo-fi aesthetic, natural body proportions.

Smartphone front camera

Mirror selfie

Slight wide-angle distortion

Indoor gym lighting

No studio polish

Negative Prompt;

The intensity in her eyes is pure adrenaline, not posing.

content:
(Vertical 9:16 smartphone aspect ratio). A raw, high-contrast side-profile mirror selfie captured with an iPhone 17 Pro using the 0.5x ultra-wide-angle lens. NO ARTIFICIAL BOKEH. Everything is SHARP and in focus from the subject's eyelashes to the power strip on the floor.
Subject & Identity Locking:
•Identity: Strictly preserve the exact face and unique features of the woman in Image 1 (Selfie).
•Bio-Fidelity: Render high-fidelity "TrueLens" skin physics: visible micro-pores, natural "satin-finish" night hydration glow, and fine peach fuzz catching the light ONLY along the jawline.
•Expression: Looking into the mirror reflection with a confident, neutral, and magnetic gaze.
•Silhouette Calibration (MAXIMUM UFF-FACTOR): Replicate high-impact side-profile proportions. Focus on a dominant structural bust volume and substantial, thick-toned gluteal and thigh volume. Emphasize the aggressive hourglass structural tapering at the waist.
Outfit & Physicality:
•Clothing: A skin-tight, {argument name="dress color" default="Deep Emerald Green"} Velvet Mini Dress.
•Tension: The reflective velvet fabric shows extreme elastic tension and a vacuum-tight fit, creating realistic micro-folds and highlight-sheen that defines her fit silhouette. The material reacts to the side-lighting, showcasing the anatomical depth of her form.
•Matter Physics: Realistic skin-to-surface compression (thigh squish) is visible as she leans slightly toward the mirror.
Pose & Composition:
•Pose: Standing in a 3/4 side-profile twist. She is popping her hip toward the mirror and arching her back to create an extreme S-curve silhouette.
•Action: Her RIGHT HAND holds a black iPhone 17 Pro (with a circular PopSocket grip), capturing the full-body reflection in an arched floor mirror.
Environment & Social Realism:
•Lighting: Direct natural window light from the side, creating high-contrast highlights and deep, sharp shadows that define the 3D volume of her physique.
•Background (SHARP): A detailed, cluttered "lived-in" bedroom. An unmade bed with grey linens, scattered pillows, a power strip with messy black cables on the wooden floor, and a plush toy on the bed are all perfectly IN FOCUS. No artificial depth-of-field; the room feels authentic and uncurated.
Quality: Raw unedited social-media "fit-check" aesthetic, high dynamic range, visible digital grain in the deep shadows (ISO 800 style), 8k resolution.

content: Use the uploaded reference photo. Low-resolution smartphone close-up selfie taken with a broken front camera screen. The image shows strong natural motion blur concentrated on the woman’s face, hair, and the cat, caused by weak autofocus, slow shutter speed, and slight hand movement while lying down. Blur appears uneven and organic, with soft smearing rather than smooth artificial blur. Facial features are partially obscured but still recognizable, with eyes, nose, and mouth visible as softened shapes. A young woman lies intimately on a cream-colored leather sofa. A light brown cat with bright green eyes is lying on the woman’s chest, pressing its body close and nuzzling its face against the woman’s cheek and jaw, partially covering her face. The cat’s head and the woman’s face overlap closely, creating intimate contact. Both the woman’s face and the cat’s face are noticeably blurred together, with softened edges and slight motion smear from small movements and breathing. The woman’s long brown hair is loose and slightly messy, falling over her forehead and partially blending into the cat’s fur due to blur. Hair strands appear heavily softened but still natural, not melted or warped. The cat’s fur texture is mostly lost, appearing as soft blurred patches consistent with low resolution and motion. Overall sharpness is low, with inconsistent focus across the frame — some tiny areas accidentally a bit clearer while most of the face and the cat remain out of focus. Flat, noisy skin texture with visible ISO noise, chroma noise, mild color banding, and muddy shadows typical of a cheap phone camera. The woman looks toward the lens with a soft, relaxed, intimate expression, though details are softened by blur. She wears simple, light-colored casual clothing, with fabric texture mostly lost. Lighting comes only from indoor room lights at night, slightly too bright, with mild overexposed highlights that do not completely blow out facial structure. Perspective distortion from the front camera wide-angle lens creates subtle stretching near the edges. The composition is very tight, awkward, and unintentional, filling the frame with the woman’s face and the cat’s body and head. The image feels like a raw, accidental selfie straight from the phone gallery — imperfect, intimate, noisy, naturally blurred, completely unedited, with no beautification and no AI enhancement.  NEGATIVE WARNINGS (important): high resolution, sharp focus, DSLR, cinematic lighting, studio lighting, ultra-detail, clean skin texture, beauty filter, HDR, professional photo, sharp edges, smooth look, AI enhancement, overprocessing, perfect blur, depth-of-field bokeh. ar 9:16

content:
A hyper-realistic, cinematic selfie portrait of a beautiful young woman seated in the driver’s seat of a luxury SUV. She has long, flowing wavy blonde hair with natural highlights, slightly tousled, framing her face organically. Her skin appears smooth and lifelike with realistic texture, soft pores, and gentle natural glow. She wears a fitted black short-sleeve top that contours naturally and a delicate silver necklace with a small minimalist pendant resting just above her collarbone. A seatbelt crosses diagonally across her chest, adding realism and casual authenticity.
The SUV interior features premium light gray leather upholstery, clean stitching, a modern dashboard softly out of focus, and a panoramic sunroof above. Sunlight streams through the windshield and sunroof, casting warm, soft shadows across her face and shoulders, creating a balanced natural lighting setup with cinematic depth. The camera angle is slightly above eye level, handheld smartphone selfie perspective, with shallow depth of field and razor-sharp facial focus.
In the top-left corner, a small rounded inset photo shows a serene suburban street lined with lush green trees, manicured lawns, and modern houses beneath a bright blue sky with scattered white clouds, adding a lifestyle storytelling element. Photorealistic rendering, ultra-detailed textures, HDR lighting, true-to-life color grading, professional DSLR quality, cinematic realism, 8K resolution, sharp focus, natural proportions.

content:
A natural, modern indoor mirror-selfie portrait of a young woman inside a stylish contemporary apartment. The image is captured at mid-to-full body length from a slightly angled side profile, reflected in a mirror. She holds a smartphone near her shoulder while taking the photo, gently turning her head back toward the mirror with a subtle, confident smile that feels relaxed and intimate.
Her expression is calm and self-assured, with relaxed eyes and softly lifted lips, conveyingeffortless confidence. She has a light-to-medium skin tone with natural texture, soft blush on the cheeks, and minimal makeup—defined brows, lightly enhanced eyes, and natural nude-toned lips. Her long dark brown hair is worn loose and straight with a slight natural wave, parted near the center, falling smoothly down her back with a few soft strands framing her face.
She wears a {argument name="clothing item" default="cropped light gray knit sweater"} with long sleeves, paired with high-waisted, loose-fitting blue denim jeans, creating a casual yet flattering silhouette. Her posture is relaxed and candid, body angled sideways with one shoulder slightly raised, reinforcing an authentic lifestyle feel.
The background features a clean, modern interior with warm wooden flooring, dark wood-paneled walls, a door and light switches, and subtle details such as a piano and a large window revealing a distant city skyline. The background remains softly out of focus to keep attention on the subject.
Lighting is warm, natural, and evenly diffused, illuminating her face and body without harsh shadows and creating a cozy, lived-in atmosphere. The color palette blends warm wood tones, soft grays, denim blues, and natural skin hues for a calm, contemporary, aesthetically balanced look.
The overall mood is intimate, modern, stylish, and effortlessly cool—like a quiet personal moment captured at home.
Use the uploaded image as the only and exact face reference. Preserve identical facial identity, structure, proportions, and expression with no alterations.
title: Modern Indoor Mirror Selfie Portrait
description: A highly detailed image generation prompt for Nano Banana Pro requesting a natural, modern indoor mirror-selfie portrait of a young woman in a contemporary apartment. The prompt specifies lighting, composition, clothing (cropped gray sweater and blue jeans), and requires preserving the facial identity from an uploaded reference image.

content:
Use the uploaded image strictly as the identity reference. Preserve the same person, facial structure, hairstyle, age, gender, body proportions, and likeness exactly. Do not add or remove any person. Do not change identity. Convert the subject into an ultra-cute kindergarten-style crayon doodle illustration.

Illustration Style:
Hand-drawn kindergarten doodle made with crayons and soft colored pencils. Lines should be thick, rounded, uneven, and slightly shaky, like a small child’s drawing. Outlines are imperfect, playful, and soft, never sharp or clean.

Color & Texture:
Bright pastel crayon colors with soft, chalky texture. Flat coloring with visible crayon grain and overlapping strokes. Colors may go slightly outside the lines to enhance the childlike feel. No realistic gradients; only simple color fills and soft watercolor-like blobs.

Facial Features:
Very simple and adorable facial features. Big round dot eyes, tiny curved smile, minimal or no nose. Cheeks can have soft pink crayon circles. Expression should feel innocent, happy, and friendly.

Proportions & Form:
Chibi-like doodle proportions — large head, small rounded body, short arms and legs. Hands and feet are simple mitten or oval shapes. Anatomy should look intentionally naive and cute.

Shading & Lighting:
No realistic lighting. No depth or shadows. If needed, add light pastel crayon scribbles under the character for grounding only.

Mood & Atmosphere:
Sweet, cozy, wholesome, and joyful. Feels like an illustration from a nursery book or a child’s school drawing. Very warm and comforting emotional tone.

Background:
Simple doodle background with crayon-drawn clouds, sun, stars, hearts, flowers, or soft scribbles. Use light pastel paper tones. Background must remain minimal and playful.

Rendering Rules:
No photorealism, no photo texture, no cinematic lighting, no digital painting, no anime, no manga, no 3D, no vector art. Everything must look hand-drawn with crayons and pencils.

Final Output:
An ultra-cute kindergarten-style crayon doodle illustration with childlike proportions, playful pastel colors, and innocent expressions, maintaining the exact identity from the uploaded image in a warm children’s storybook style.

A young adult woman of mixed {argument name="heritage" default="Asian Javanese European and Korean"} heritage poses confidently in front of a gym mirror. Her facial features are striking yet harmonious, blending soft Javanese contours with sharp European structure and refined Korean aesthetics. She has smooth warm toned skin, defined cheekbones, a balanced jawline, and expressive eyes that convey calm focus. Her appearance feels naturally exotic and modern, with a subtle elegance that stands out without exaggeration.

Her body is compact and powerfully built, with dense muscle definition and a firm athletic silhouette. The physique appears packed and solid, showcasing strength through toned thighs, sculpted calves, a tight core, and well defined arms while maintaining feminine proportions. Every movement suggests control and physical confidence.

Her hair is dark and glossy, styled neatly in a practical yet stylish look suitable for training. Makeup remains minimal and natural, enhancing her features without overpowering them. She wears fitted gym attire that hugs her form, emphasizing muscle density and structure while allowing freedom of movement.

She is positioned low in a squat facing the mirror, one knee slightly forward, torso leaning subtly toward the reflection. One hand holds the phone vertically in front of her face while the other rests casually on her knee. Her gaze is directed at the phone screen, focused and composed.

The environment remains an indoor gym with full height mirrors, warm overhead lighting, and softly blurred equipment in the background. The atmosphere feels intimate yet energetic, combining elegance, strength, and modern athletic aesthetics.

content:
1. Scouter Prompt
Overlays a Scouter-style UI onto the reference image and infers and displays the combat power based on the character's features.

2. Super Transformation Prompt
Maintains the character features from the reference image and changes the pose to an 'Awakening Pose' to 'Super Transform' them. 'Super Transformation' can be selected from Form 1 to Form 3, as well as God Form, Blue Form, Extreme Form, and Rose Form.

3. Field Deployment Prompt
Changes the character in the reference image to a pose with hands extended forward and deploys a field.

4. Retro RPG Status Screen Prompt
A prompt that converts the character in the reference image into pixel art and generates an image styled like a retro RPG status screen.

5. Desktop Mascot Prompt
A prompt that generates an image of the character from the reference image turned into a desktop mascot and placed on a PC screen.

6. Style Change Only on Torn Parts Prompt
Adds a tearing effect without changing the reference image itself, allowing the art style of only the torn part to be freely switched to line art, ink painting, figure style, colored pencil, watercolor, pencil drawing, etc.

7. Art Style Conversion Prompt
A prompt created by modifying the 'Style Change Only on Torn Parts Prompt' to change the overall art style.

8. Super Robot Wars Battle Sequence Prompt
A prompt that generates an image styled like a Super Robot Wars battle sequence from the reference image.

9. Power Release Prompt
A prompt that reproduces the depiction of a spherical energy space destroying an object.

10. Participation Screen Prompt
A prompt that generates a 'Participation Screen' for the character in the reference image.

11. Total Concentration Prompt
Maintains the character from the reference image and infers and depicts 'Weapon, Breathing Style, Form, and Move Name' from the character's atmosphere and stance.

12. Kamehameha Style Prompt
A prompt that can stably generate the charging pose and activation pose of 'Kamehameha.'

13. Figure Transformation + Product Introduction Layout Prompt
A prompt that transforms the character in the reference image into a figure and lays it out in a product introduction style.

14. Final Flash Style Prompt
Converts the character in the reference image into the activation, charging, and firing poses of 'Final Flash.' Dialogue and sound effects can be added to each.

15. New Profile Image Generation Prompt
Generates the character from the reference image in an arbitrary aspect ratio and places an arbitrary string as a logo in an arbitrary position.

16. Plastic Model Package Prompt
Generates an image styled like a 'Plastic Model Package' by placing the reference image on the front and side.

17. Eraser Gun Style Prompt
The character in the reference image emits an Eraser Gun-style energy wave from their mouth.

18. Ragged Transformation Prompt
A prompt that transforms the character in the reference image into 'rags.'

content:
Using the user-uploaded reference image as the base, add a classic Christmas Santa hat to the subject.

Style match: preserve the original art style exactly (2D/3D/photorealistic/anime/cartoon), keeping identity, facial features, hairstyle, colors, shading, and overall composition unchanged.

Hat design: traditional Santa hat (red felt with subtle fabric texture, white fluffy trim, white pom-pom). Place it naturally on top of the head, aligned to head angle and hairline. Respect perspective, scale, and head shape.

Integration: match the existing lighting, shadows, highlights, linework, and rendering style. Add realistic contact shadows where the hat touches hair/forehead. Do not alter the face, hair, background, clothing, or any other elements.

Output: square (1:1) avatar, crisp and clear at small profile-picture size.

Pose: She stands in front of a tall floor mirror. She adopts a flattering pose: one leg is stepped slightly forward, and she pops her hip to the side, accentuating her curves. 

She holds an iPhone (with a cute case) up to the mirror. She is looking at the phone screen in the reflection, not the camera.

Outfit (The "Lazy-Hot" Look):*

Bottom: Grey sweatpants worn low-rise (rolled down at the waist) to highlight her waist-to-hip ratio.

Environment: The room is a typical teenager's bedroom. Unmade bed in the background, soft LED strip lights (purple or warm white) on the ceiling, and maybe some clothes on a chair. It feels lived-in and authentic.

Lighting: Natural light coming from a window mixed with the soft indoor room light, creating a flattering, soft glow on her skin.

content:
A high-angle selfie perspective captures a young woman with a light skin tone and a subtle tan, sitting on a dark hardwood floor partially covered by a plush white faux fur rug, with one arm extended toward the lens holding the camera. Her legs are bent and tucked to the side. She wears a chunky cream-colored cable-knit sweater dress with a thick, textured knit pattern and an off-the-shoulder neckline that exposes her shoulders and collarbone, finished with long, oversized sleeves. Her long, voluminous blonde hair falls in loose waves with a side part. Her makeup features defined eyebrows, striking winged eyeliner, glossy nude lips, and soft contouring. She holds a soft, alluring gaze, her head tilted slightly to the right.

The setting is a richly cozy, dimly lit living room interior designed for warmth and comfort. Behind her is a substantial, rough-cut natural stone fireplace constructed with professional masonry, its uneven stone surface catching the firelight as bright orange flames burn steadily within. The surrounding space features dark, polished hardwood floors and well-appointed, comfortable furniture with a lived-in, upscale lodge-like feel. In the background, a decorated Christmas tree glows softly, strung with warm white lights that fall into gentle bokeh blur in the distance, adding depth and seasonal atmosphere without distracting from the subject. Christmas presents with colorful wrapping surround the base of the Christmas tree. The overall interior feels intimate, inviting, and quietly luxurious.

Lighting is dominated by a direct on-camera flash, producing crisp highlights on the subject and pronounced shadows cast behind her, while the fireplace provides a secondary warm ambient glow that subtly fills the room. The image aesthetic evokes early-2000s digital camera photography blended with influencer lifestyle imagery, capturing a cozy winter evening mood through a palette of warm neutrals, creamy whites, amber firelight, and deep brown shadows.
title: Cozy Yule Tide Selfie Portrait
description: A detailed prompt for generating a high-angle, cozy winter selfie portrait of a young woman in a cable-knit sweater dress, set in a dimly lit, upscale living room with a fireplace and a glowing Christmas tree, utilizing early 2000s digital camera aesthetics and flash photography.

content: Create a monochrome studio portrait of a man. Use minimal lighting with soft falloff so the focus stays entirely on him, with subtle gradients and deep shadows shaping his face. The composition should be a tight-medium shot against a clean, distraction-free background. He’s dressed in a casual, stylish outfit—like a simple tee or sweatshirt with light texture that works well in black and white. The overall mood should feel calm and confident, with a pleasing, balanced vibe. Render it in high-contrast black and white with crisp details, smooth tones, and a subtle cinematic depth.

description: A prompt for generating a high-contrast, black and white studio portrait of a man. It emphasizes minimal lighting with soft falloff to focus attention entirely on the subject, creating subtle gradients and deep shadows for a calm, confident, and cinematic mood.

content:
Use the uploaded image as the reference for the subject's face and likeness. Do not alter facial features; maintain 100% feature consistency. Generate the image in a Vertical 9:16 aspect ratio. She is looking directly into the lens with a 'Cold Stare' expression—sharp direct eye contact, lips closed, icy and powerful. The camera angle is a dynamic Dutch Angle (tilted).
The setting is a 'Rooftop Night' with a glass railing behind her and a bokeh city skyline in the distance. The atmosphere is a 'Neon Night,' with {argument name="neon colors" default="blue and pink"} light casting a cyberpunk glow on her skin. In the background, blurred by deep bokeh, there is a hint of 'Nightlife' activity with people standing in line.
She is wearing a rich {argument name="top color" default="burgundy"} 'Velvet Off-Shoulder Bustier' paired with a high-waisted black 'Leather Mini' skirt. Her hair is styled in a severe 'Slicked-Back Bun.' Her makeup focuses on 'Siren Eyes' with elongated eyeliner.
Her free hand is holding a 'Takeaway Cocktail' in a clear plastic cup with a neon straw and glowing ice cubes. On the wrist of the stretched arm, she wears a 'Thick Silver Curb Chain' bracelet. Her nails are long 'Vampy Stiletto' style in deep black. She wears a 'Statement Silver' cuban link chain. The image has a sharp modern smartphone aesthetic.

content:
Subject:
A young woman with a sun-kissed, fair complexion and a constellation of freckles most prominent across the bridge of her nose and cheeks, rendered with Deep Fusion texture accuracy. Her hair is a cascade of long, tousled brown waves. She has one eye open—a sharp, captivating green/hazel orb with intricate iris detail—and one eye closed in a wink. Her eyebrows are full, dark, and naturally shaped.

Attire & Details:

She wears a playful black bikini top with classic white polka dots. A delicate, layered gold chain necklace rests at her neck, catching the light.

Expression & Pose:

Her expression is irresistibly cheeky and playful. She winks with her right eye (viewer's left), her tongue peeking out slightly at the corner of her smiling mouth, revealing a glimpse of teeth. Her right hand rests casually atop her head, fingers lightly buried in her hair. The frame is a close-up, selfie-style portrait where the curve of her arm holding the device is visible, creating an intimate, immediate feel.

Environment & New Shot Setup:

She is in the sea, swimming. The shot is now captured from above by a drone. Below her stretches clear, turquoise water. The background is a tropical beach or coastal setting with blurred vibrant green palm leaves or a sandy shoreline.

Lighting:

The scene is bathed in bright, natural daylight. Sunlight filtering through leaves above creates soft, dynamic patterns of light and shadow on the water's surface and on the young woman, expertly balanced by Smart HDR processing to preserve detail in both highlights and shadows. Sparkling glints and reflections on the water add visual richness.

Technical Specifications:

Device: iPhone 17 Pro Max (simulating Drone Control/Recording)

Camera: Main or Telephoto Lens (suited for top-down shot)

Lens: 48mm or 77mm equivalent, wide aperture

Shot Details: 48MP ProRAW / HEIF Max

Processing: Photonic Engine, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 6

Style: Standard Photographic Style, leveraging extreme dynamic range

Quality Tags: Ultra-fine facial detail, natural skin texture, tack-sharp focus, 8K resolution, mobile photography masterpiece, 'Shot on iPhone' aesthetic, aerial shot, over-water composition.

She’s wearing a {argument name="top style" default="vintage-style spaghetti-strap crop top"} and {argument name="bottom style" default="high-waisted denim shorts"}. Soft late-afternoon golden sunlight streaming through the window, gently hitting her skin, face, and the cat’s fur, creating warm natural highlights and glows. Slightly warm yellow-orange-gray tone, subtle digital noise and grain for that authentic vintage digital look.

Composition: Half-body mirror shot, focus sharply on her face and the cat as the main subjects. Background shows a simple white bed and plain walls, with soft patches of sunlight falling across the wall and bed, contrasted by gentle shadows from the angled light. Overall framing feels like a casual, candid early-2000s snapshot.

Overall atmosphere: Warm, natural, unposed, and intimate. The natural light enhances the retro digital vintage vibe — charming, approachable, and nostalgic, like a simple everyday moment captured on a sunny afternoon in the 2000s.
